titleStmt.title: A Letter to the Bishop of Munster; containing a panegyrick of his heroick atchievments, in heroick verse.
titleStmt.author: Bernhard, Prince-Bishop of Münster, 1606-1678.

biblFull.extent: 8 p., [1] folded leaf of plates : ill., port.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Christopher Barnard Matthew van Gale, Bishop of Münster.
Item at reel 1653:31 identified as Wing G162 (number cancelled in CD-ROM).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
